blocks.name: fprod
blocks.content: The value of a product over a nonempty finite set. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 6-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: fprodntriv
blocks.content: A non-triviality lemma for finite sequences. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Dec-2017.)

blocks.name: prodfc
blocks.content: A lemma to facilitate conversions from the function form to the class-variable form of a product. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 7-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm prodfc(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cprod(s0, c0, cfv(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s0))), cprod(s1, c0, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cprod(s0, c0, cfv(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s0))), cprod(s1, c0, c1), cprod(s1, c0, cfv(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s1))), cprod(s1, c0, cfv(cid, c1)))
  prodeq2i(s1, c0, cfv(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(cid, c1))
  fvmpt2i(s1, c0, cmpt(s1, c0, c1), c1)
  eqid(cmpt(s1, c0, c1))
  cbvprodi(s0, s1, c0, cfv(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s0)), cfv(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s1)))
  nffvmpt1(s1, c0, c1, cv(s0))
  nfcv(s0, cfv(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s1)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(s1), cmpt(s1, c0, c1))
  prod2id(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s1))
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: prodss
blocks.content: Change the index set to a subset in an upper integer product. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.content: Change the index set to a subset in a finite sum. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Dec-2017.)

blocks.name: fprodser
blocks.content: A finite product expressed in terms of a partial product of an infinite sequence. The recursive definition of a finite product follows from here. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 14-Dec-2017.)

blocks.name: fprodcl2lem
blocks.content: Finite product closure lemma. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 14-Dec-2017.)

  |- wi(w0, wcel(cprod(s0, c0, c1), c2))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

} = {
  mpjaod(w0, wcel(cprod(s0, c0, c1), c2), wceq(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wex(hs0, wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0))))

  expimpd(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wex(hs0, wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0)), wcel(cprod(s0, c0, c1), c2))

  adantlr(w0, wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs1)), cc))

  fmpttd(s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  ad2antll(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0), wf(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0))
  f1of(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0)
  fco(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c2, cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)))
  adantlr(w0, wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), c2)), wcel(co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s2)), c2))
  syl(w0, wo(wceq(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wex(hs0, wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0)))), wcel(c0, cfn))

  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, c0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)

  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0)))

blocks.name: fprodcllem
blocks.content: Finite product closure lemma. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 14-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm fprodcllem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cprod(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), c2))), wcel(co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s2)), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(nat1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61dane(c0, emptycls, w0, wcel(cprod(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  eqeltrd(cprod(s0, c0, c1), c2, nat1, wa(w0, wceq(c0, emptycls)))
  adantl(w0, wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), nat1))
  syl6eq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), nat1, cprod(s0, emptycls, c1), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  prodeq1(s0, c0, emptycls, c1)
  prod0(s0, c1)
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, emptycls), wcel(nat1, c2))
  fprodcl2lem(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, wa(w0, wne(c0, emptycls)))
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, emptycls), wss(c2, cc))
  adantlr(w0, wne(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), c2)), wcel(co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s2)), c2))
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c0, cfn))
  adantlr(w0, wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpr(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  diff.wne.s(s0, c0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  diff.wne.s(s1, c0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  diff.wne.s(s2, c0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: fproddiv
blocks.content: The quotient of two finite products. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 15-Jan-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm fproddiv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, co(c1, cdiv, c2)), co(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cdiv, cprod(s0, c0, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wne(c2, nat0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpjaod(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, co(c1, cdiv, c2)), co(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cdiv, cprod(s0, c0, c2))), wceq(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wex(hs0, wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0))))
  a1i(w0, wi(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(cprod(s0, c0, co(c1, cdiv, c2)), co(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cdiv, cprod(s0, c0, c2)))))

  eqcomi(nat1, co(nat1, cdiv, nat1))
  1div1e1()

  prodeq1(s0, c0, emptycls, co(c1, cdiv, c2))
  prod0(s0, co(c1, cdiv, c2))
  oveq12d(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cdiv, cprod(s0, c0, c2), nat1, nat1, wceq(c0, emptycls))
  syl6eq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), nat1, cprod(s0, emptycls, c1), wceq(c0, emptycls))

blocks.name: fprod1
blocks.content: A finite product of only one term is the term itself. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 14-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm fprod1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(cprod(s0, co(c0, cfz, c0), c2), c1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c2, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqtrd(cprod(s0, co(c0, cfz, c0), c2), c1, cprod(s0, csn(c0), c2), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cc)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(cprod(s0, co(c0, cfz, c0), c2), cprod(s0, csn(c0), c2)))
  prodeq1d(s0, co(c0, cfz, c0), c2, csn(c0), wcel(c0, cz))
  fzsn(c0)
  prodsn(s0, c0, cz, c1, c2)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cfz, c0)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: prodsnf
blocks.content: A product of a singleton is the term. A version of ~ prodsn using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm prodsnf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(cprod(s0, csn(c0), c3), c2))
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqtrd(cprod(s0, csn(c0), c3), c2, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, csn(cop(nat1, c2))), nat1), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)))
  syl5eq(cprod(s0, csn(c0), c3), cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, csn(cop(nat1, c2))), nat1), cprod(hs0, csn(c0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)))
  cbvprodi(s0, hs0, csn(c0), c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3))
  nfcv(hs0, c3)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  fprod(hs0, hs1, csn(c0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), csn(cop(nat1, c2)), nat1, csn(cop(nat1, c0)), csb(s0, cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), cv(hs1)), c3), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), cv(hs1)), c3)
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(nat1, cn))

thm fprodshft(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ prod(s0 âˆˆ(c0[...]c1), c2)= prod(s1 âˆˆ((c0[+]c3)[...](c1[+]c3)), c4))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c3 âˆˆ â„¤)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ â„¤)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c1 âˆˆ â„¤)
  âŠ£ ((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ(c0[...]c1))â†’ c2 âˆˆ â„‚)
  âŠ£ (s0 =(s1[-]c3)â†’ c2 = c4)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c3)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c4)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c2)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c3)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  fprodf1o(s0, s1, (c0[...]c1), c2, ((c0[+]c3)[...](c1[+]c3)), c4, (s1[-]c3), (s0 âˆˆ((c0[+]c3)[...](c1[+]c3))â†¦(s0[-]c3)), w0)
  fzfid((c0[+]c3), (c1[+]c3), w0)
  mptfzshft(s0, c0, c3, c1, w0)
  adantl(w0, s1 âˆˆ((c0[+]c3)[...](c1[+]c3)), ((s0 âˆˆ((c0[+]c3)[...](c1[+]c3))â†¦(s0[-]c3))` s1)=(s1[-]c3))
  fvmpt(s0, s1, ((c0[+]c3)[...](c1[+]c3)), (s0 âˆˆ((c0[+]c3)[...](c1[+]c3))â†¦(s0[-]c3)), (s1[-]c3), (s0[-]c3))
  oveq1(s0, s1, cmin, c3)
  eqid((s0 âˆˆ((c0[+]c3)[...](c1[+]c3))â†¦(s0[-]c3)))
  ovex(s1, cmin, c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cfz, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, s1, cmin, c3)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cfz, c1)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, ((c0[+]c3)[...](c1[+]c3)), (s0[-]c3))
  diff.co.s(s1, (c0[+]c3), cfz, (c1[+]c3))
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, caddc, c3)
  diff.cfz.s(s1)

  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, s0, cmin, c3)

  syl5ibrcom(wcel(c1, cc), wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), co(c1, cexp, cfv(chash, c0))), wceq(nat1, co(c1, cexp, nat0)))

  |- wi(wa(w0, w1), wceq(cprod(s0, cun(cv(s1), csn(cv(s2))), cprod(s3, c0, c1)), cprod(s4, ciun(s0, cun(cv(s1), csn(cv(s2))), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c0)), c2)))

  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(cun(cv(s1), csn(cv(s2))), c3))

  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.cun.s(s3, s1, { s2 })

  diff.cc.s(s3)
}

blocks.name: fprod2d
blocks.content: Write a double product as a product over a two-dimensional region. Compare ~ fsum2d . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 30-Jan-2018.)

blocks.name: fprodxp
blocks.content: Combine two products into a single product over the cartesian product. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 1-Feb-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm fprodxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, cprod(s1, c1, c2)), cprod(s2, cxp(c0, c1), c3)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(c3, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  syl6eq(cprod(s0, c0, cprod(s1, c1, c2)), cprod(s2, cxp(c0, c1), c3), cprod(s2, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3), w0)
  fprod2d(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, cfn))
  prodeq1i(s2, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3, cxp(c0, c1))
  iunxpconst(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.ciun.s(s2, s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1))
  diff.cxp.s(s2, csn(cv(s0)), c1)
  diff.csn.s(s2, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s2, c0, c1)
}

thm fprodxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ prod(s0 âˆˆ c0, prod(s1 âˆˆ c1, c2))= prod(s2 âˆˆ(c0 Ã— c1), c3))
  âŠ£ (s2 = < s0, s1 > â†’ c3 = c2)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ Fin)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c1 âˆˆ Fin)
  âŠ£ ((w0 âˆ§(s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ s1 âˆˆ c1))â†’ c2 âˆˆ â„‚)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s2)
  âŠ£ d(s1, s2)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c3)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c3)
  âŠ£ d(s2, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s2, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s2, c2)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, w0)
  âŠ£ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  syl6eq(prod(s0 âˆˆ c0, prod(s1 âˆˆ c1, c2)), prod(s2 âˆˆ(c0 Ã— c1), c3), prod(s2 âˆˆ â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0,({ s0 } Ã— c1)), c3), w0)
  fprod2d(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  adantr(w0, s0 âˆˆ c0, c1 âˆˆ Fin)
  prodeq1i(s2, â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0,({ s0 } Ã— c1)), c3, (c0 Ã— c1))
  iunxpconst(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.ciun.s(s2, s0, c0, ({ s0 } Ã— c1))
  diff.cxp.s(s2, { s0 }, c1)
  diff.csn.s(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s2, c0, c1)

blocks.name: fprodcnv
blocks.content: Transform a product region using the converse operation. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 1-Feb-2018.)

thm fprodcnv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s1, ccnv(c0), c2)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wceq(c1, c3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cop(cv(s3), cv(s2))), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wrel(c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl6eqr(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s1, ccnv(c0), c2), cprod(s1, ccnv(c0), csb(s2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), csb(s3, cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), c3))), w0)
  fprodf1o(s0, s1, c0, c1, ccnv(c0), csb(s2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), csb(s3, cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), c3)), cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), w0)
  syl6eqr(c1, csb(s2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), csb(s3, cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), c3)), csb(s0, cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))))
  csbeq1a(s0, cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), c1)
  csbie2(s2, s3, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), c3, csb(s0, cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), c1))
  syl5eqr(c3, csb(s0, cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), c1), csb(s0, cop(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c1), wa(wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))))
  csbie(s0, cop(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c1, c3)
  opex(cv(s2), cv(s3))
  csbeq1d(s0, cop(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c1, cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), wa(wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))))
  opeq12(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cv(s3), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))
  syl(w0, wcel(ccnv(c0), cfn), wcel(c0, cfn))
  cnvfi(c0)
  mpbii(w0, wf1o(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), ccnv(c0), c0), wf1o(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), ccnv(c0), ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
  ax-mp(wf1o(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), ccnv(c0), ccnv(ccnv(c0))), wrel(ccnv(c0)))
  cnvf1o(hs0, ccnv(c0))
  f1oeq3d(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), ccnv(c0), ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c0, w0)
  sylib(w0, wceq(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c0), wrel(c0))
  dfrel2(c0)
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s1), ccnv(c0)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), cv(s1)), cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))))
  eqtrd(cfv(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), cv(s1)), cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), cfv(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s1), ccnv(c0)))
  fveq2d(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), cv(s1), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), ccnv(c0)))
  syl(wcel(cv(s1), ccnv(c0)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))), cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))), wcel(cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), ccnv(c0)))
  ibi(wcel(cv(s1), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), ccnv(c0)))
  eleq1d(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), ccnv(c0)))
  fvmpt(hs0, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), ccnv(c0), cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0)))))
  syl6eq(cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0)))), cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), cuni(ccnv(csn(cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))))
  unieqd(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))), ccnv(csn(cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))))
  cnveqd(csn(cv(hs0)), csn(cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))))
  sneq(cv(hs0), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))))
  opswap(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))))
  opex(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))
  prodeq2i(s1, ccnv(c0), c2, csb(s2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), csb(s3, cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), c3)))
  syl6eqr(c2, csb(s2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), csb(s3, cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), c3)), csb(s1, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), c2), wcel(cv(s1), ccnv(c0)))
  syl(wcel(cv(s1), ccnv(c0)), wceq(c2, csb(s1, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), c2)), wceq(cv(s1), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))))
  mpan(wcel(cv(s1), ccnv(c0)), wceq(cv(s1), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))), wrel(ccnv(c0)))
  relcnv(c0)
  1st2nd(ccnv(c0), cv(s1))
  csbeq1a(s1, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), c2)
  csbie2(s2, s3, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), c3, csb(s1, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), c2))
  fvex(c2nd, cv(s1))
  fvex(c1st, cv(s1))
  syl5eqr(c3, csb(s1, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), c2), csb(s1, cop(cv(s3), cv(s2)), c2), wa(wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))))
  csbie(s1, cop(cv(s3), cv(s2)), c2, c3)
  opex(cv(s3), cv(s2))
  csbeq1d(s1, cop(cv(s3), cv(s2)), c2, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), wa(wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))))
  ancoms(wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), wceq(cop(cv(s3), cv(s2)), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))))
  opeq12(cv(s3), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))
  diff.csb.s(s0, s2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), csb(s3, cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), c3))
  diff.csb.s(s0, s3, cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), c3)
  diff.cop.s(s0, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2nd, cv(s1))
  diff.c2nd.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1st, cv(s1))
  diff.c1st.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0)))))
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c0)
  diff.cuni.s(s1, ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, csn(cv(hs0)))
  diff.csn.s(s1, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.csb.s(s2, s0, cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), c1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cop.s(s2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))
  diff.csb.s(s3, s0, cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), c1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.cop.s(s3, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))
  diff.cop.s(s0, cv(s2), cv(s3))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s3)
  diff.hs0.c(ccnv(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))))
  diff.hs0.c(cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))))
  diff.csb.s(s2, s1, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), c2)
  diff.cop.s(s2, cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))
  diff.cfv.s(s2, c1st, cv(s1))
  diff.c1st.s(s2)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, c2nd, cv(s1))
  diff.c2nd.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.csb.s(s3, s1, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), c2)
  diff.cop.s(s3, cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))
  diff.cfv.s(s3, c1st, cv(s1))
  diff.c1st.s(s3)
  diff.cfv.s(s3, c2nd, cv(s1))

  diff.cop.s(s1, cv(s3), cv(s2))

}

thm fprodcnv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ prod(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)= prod(s1 âˆˆ `' c0, c2))
  âŠ£ (s0 = < s2, s3 > â†’ c1 = c3)

} = {
  syl6eqr(prod(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1), prod(s1 âˆˆ `' c0, c2), prod(s1 âˆˆ `' c0,[(2nd ` s1)/ s2][(1st ` s1)/ s3]c3), w0)

  syl6eqr(c1, [(2nd ` s1)/ s2][(1st ` s1)/ s3]c3, [<(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)> / s0]c1, s0 = <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>)
  csbeq1a(s0, <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>, c1)
  csbie2(s2, s3, (2nd ` s1), (1st ` s1), c3, [<(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)> / s0]c1)
  syl5eqr(c3, [<(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)> / s0]c1, [< s2, s3 > / s0]c1, (s2 =(2nd ` s1)âˆ§ s3 =(1st ` s1)))
  csbie(s0, < s2, s3 >, c1, c3)
  opex(s2, s3)
  csbeq1d(s0, < s2, s3 >, c1, <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>, (s2 =(2nd ` s1)âˆ§ s3 =(1st ` s1)))
  opeq12(s2, (2nd ` s1), s3, (1st ` s1))
  syl(w0, `' c0 âˆˆ Fin, c0 âˆˆ Fin)
  cnvfi(c0)
  mpbii(w0, ((hs0 âˆˆ `' c0 â†¦ â‹ƒ `' { hs0 }): `' c0 â†” c0), ((hs0 âˆˆ `' c0 â†¦ â‹ƒ `' { hs0 }): `' c0 â†” `' `' c0))
  ax-mp(((hs0 âˆˆ `' c0 â†¦ â‹ƒ `' { hs0 }): `' c0 â†” `' `' c0), Rel(`' c0))
  cnvf1o(hs0, `' c0)
  f1oeq3d((hs0 âˆˆ `' c0 â†¦ â‹ƒ `' { hs0 }), `' c0, `' `' c0, c0, w0)

  eqtrd(((hs0 âˆˆ `' c0 â†¦ â‹ƒ `' { hs0 })` s1), <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>, ((hs0 âˆˆ `' c0 â†¦ â‹ƒ `' { hs0 })` <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>), s1 âˆˆ `' c0)
  fveq2d((hs0 âˆˆ `' c0 â†¦ â‹ƒ `' { hs0 }), s1, <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>, s1 âˆˆ `' c0)
  syl(s1 âˆˆ `' c0, ((hs0 âˆˆ `' c0 â†¦ â‹ƒ `' { hs0 })` <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>)= <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>, <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)> âˆˆ `' c0)
  ibi(s1 âˆˆ `' c0, <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)> âˆˆ `' c0)

  fvmpt(hs0, <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>, `' c0, (hs0 âˆˆ `' c0 â†¦ â‹ƒ `' { hs0 }), <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>, â‹ƒ `' { hs0 })
  syl6eq(â‹ƒ `' { hs0 }, <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>, â‹ƒ `' { <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)> }, hs0 = <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>)
  unieqd(`' { hs0 }, `' { <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)> }, hs0 = <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>)
  cnveqd({ hs0 }, { <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)> }, hs0 = <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>)

  syl6eqr(c2, [(2nd ` s1)/ s2][(1st ` s1)/ s3]c3, [<(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)> / s1]c2, s1 âˆˆ `' c0)
  syl(s1 âˆˆ `' c0, c2 =[<(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)> / s1]c2, s1 = <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>)
  mpan(s1 âˆˆ `' c0, s1 = <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>, Rel(`' c0))

blocks.content: Interchange order of multiplication. Note that ` B ( j ) ` and ` D ( k ) ` are not necessarily constant expressions. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 1-Feb-2018.) (Proof shortened by JJ, 2-Aug-2021.)

blocks.name: fprodcom
blocks.content: Interchange product order. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 2-Feb-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm fprodcom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, cprod(s1, c1, c2)), cprod(s1, c1, cprod(s0, c0, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  fprodcom2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c1, c0, w0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, cfn))
  a1i(w0, wb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
  ancom(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
}

thm fprodcom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ prod(s0 âˆˆ c0, prod(s1 âˆˆ c1, c2))= prod(s1 âˆˆ c1, prod(s0 âˆˆ c0, c2)))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ Fin)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c1 âˆˆ Fin)
  âŠ£ ((w0 âˆ§(s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ s1 âˆˆ c1))â†’ c2 âˆˆ â„‚)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  fprodcom2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c1, c0, w0)
  adantr(w0, s0 âˆˆ c0, c1 âˆˆ Fin)
  a1i(w0, ((s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ s1 âˆˆ c1)â†”(s1 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0)))
  ancom(s0 âˆˆ c0, s1 âˆˆ c1)
}

  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  3eqtrd(prod(s0 âˆˆ c0,(c1[Ã·]c2)), (prod(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)[Ã·]prod(s0 âˆˆ c0, c2)), prod(hs0 âˆˆ c0,([hs0 / s0]c1[Ã·][hs0 / s0]c2)), (prod(hs0 âˆˆ c0,[hs0 / s0]c1)[Ã·]prod(hs0 âˆˆ c0,[hs0 / s0]c2)), w0)

  nfim(s0, (w0 âˆ§ hs0 âˆˆ c0), [hs0 / s0]c1 âˆˆ â„‚)
  nfel1(s0, [hs0 / s0]c1, cc)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0), c1 âˆˆ â„‚, (w0 âˆ§ hs0 âˆˆ c0), [hs0 / s0]c1 âˆˆ â„‚)
  eleq1d(c1, cc, [hs0 / s0]c1, s0 = hs0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 âˆ§ hs0 âˆˆ c0)â†’[hs0 / s0]c2 âˆˆ â„‚), ((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0)â†’ c2 âˆˆ â„‚))
  nfim(s0, (w0 âˆ§ hs0 âˆˆ c0), [hs0 / s0]c2 âˆˆ â„‚)

  eleq1d(c2, cc, [hs0 / s0]c2, s0 = hs0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 âˆ§ hs0 âˆˆ c0)â†’[hs0 / s0]c2 â‰  0), ((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0)â†’ c2 â‰  0))
  nfim(s0, (w0 âˆ§ hs0 âˆˆ c0), [hs0 / s0]c2 â‰  0)

  eqcomi(prod(hs0 âˆˆ c0,[hs0 / s0]c1), prod(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1))
  cbvprodi(s0, hs0, c0, c1, [hs0 / s0]c1)

blocks.name: fprodsplitf
blocks.content: Split a finite product into two parts. A version of ~ fprodsplit using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fprodsplitf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), co(cprod(s0, c2, c1), cmul, cprod(s0, c3, c1))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c2, c3), emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cun(c2, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cprod(s0, c0, c1), co(cprod(s0, c2, c1), cmul, cprod(s0, c3, c1)), cprod(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), co(cprod(hs0, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), cmul, cprod(hs0, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))), w0)
  fprodsplit(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c2, c3, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfel1(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  eleq1d(c1, cc, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  cbvprodi(s0, hs0, c0, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq12i(cprod(s0, c2, c1), cmul, cprod(s0, c3, c1), cprod(hs0, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), cprod(hs0, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  cbvprodi(s0, hs0, c2, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  cbvprodi(s0, hs0, c3, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

thm fprodsplitf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ prod(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)=(prod(s0 âˆˆ c2, c1)[Ã—]prod(s0 âˆˆ c3, c1)))
  âŠ£ F/(s0, w0)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’(c2 â‹‚ c3)= âˆ…)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c0 =(c2 â‹ƒ c3))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ Fin)
  âŠ£ ((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0)â†’ c1 âˆˆ â„‚)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c2)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(prod(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1), (prod(s0 âˆˆ c2, c1)[Ã—]prod(s0 âˆˆ c3, c1)), prod(hs0 âˆˆ c0,[hs0 / s0]c1), (prod(hs0 âˆˆ c2,[hs0 / s0]c1)[Ã—]prod(hs0 âˆˆ c3,[hs0 / s0]c1)), w0)
  fprodsplit(hs0, c0, [hs0 / s0]c1, c2, c3, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 âˆ§ hs0 âˆˆ c0)â†’[hs0 / s0]c1 âˆˆ â„‚), ((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0)â†’ c1 âˆˆ â„‚))
  nfim(s0, (w0 âˆ§ hs0 âˆˆ c0), [hs0 / s0]c1 âˆˆ â„‚)
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 âˆˆ c0)
  nfv(s0, hs0 âˆˆ c0)
  nfel1(s0, [hs0 / s0]c1, cc)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0), c1 âˆˆ â„‚, (w0 âˆ§ hs0 âˆˆ c0), [hs0 / s0]c1 âˆˆ â„‚)
  anbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, s0 âˆˆ c0, hs0 âˆˆ c0)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  eleq1d(c1, cc, [hs0 / s0]c1, s0 = hs0)
  cbvprodi(s0, hs0, c0, c1, [hs0 / s0]c1)
  oveq12i(prod(s0 âˆˆ c2, c1), cmul, prod(s0 âˆˆ c3, c1), prod(hs0 âˆˆ c2,[hs0 / s0]c1), prod(hs0 âˆˆ c3,[hs0 / s0]c1))
  cbvprodi(s0, hs0, c2, c1, [hs0 / s0]c1)
  cbvprodi(s0, hs0, c3, c1, [hs0 / s0]c1)
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: fprodsplitsn
blocks.content: Separate out a term in a finite product. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fprodsplitsn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c2), co(cprod(s0, c0, c2), cmul, c3)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c3)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c1, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  eqtrd(cprod(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c2), co(cprod(s0, c0, c2), cmul, c3), co(cprod(s0, c0, c2), cmul, cprod(s0, csn(c1), c2)), w0)
  fprodsplitf(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c2, c0, csn(c1), w0)
  sylibr(w0, wceq(cin(c0, csn(c1)), emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, c0)))
  disjsn(c0, c1)
  eqidd(cun(c0, csn(c1)), w0)
  sylancl(w0, wcel(cun(c0, csn(c1)), cfn), wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(csn(c1), cfn))
  snfi(c1)
  unfi(c0, csn(c1))
  pm2.61dan(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1)))), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, cc))
  eqeltrd(c2, cc, c3, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1)))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1)))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  adantll(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wceq(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), csn(c1)))
  elunnel1(cv(s0), c0, csn(c1))
  elsni(cv(s0), c1)
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c3, cc))
  oveq2d(cprod(s0, c0, c2), cmul, cprod(s0, csn(c1), c2), c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, csn(c1), c2), c3), wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c3, cc))
  prodsnf(s0, c1, c4, c3, c2)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, csn(c1))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
}

thm fprodsplitsn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ prod(s0 âˆˆ(c0 â‹ƒ { c1 }), c2)=(prod(s0 âˆˆ c0, c2)[Ã—]c3))
  âŠ£ F/(s0, w0)
  âŠ£ F/(s0, c3)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ Fin)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c1 âˆˆ c4)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ Â¬ c1 âˆˆ c0)
  âŠ£ ((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0)â†’ c2 âˆˆ â„‚)
  âŠ£ (s0 = c1 â†’ c2 = c3)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c3 âˆˆ â„‚)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  eqtrd(prod(s0 âˆˆ(c0 â‹ƒ { c1 }), c2), (prod(s0 âˆˆ c0, c2)[Ã—]c3), (prod(s0 âˆˆ c0, c2)[Ã—]prod(s0 âˆˆ { c1 }, c2)), w0)
  fprodsplitf(s0, (c0 â‹ƒ { c1 }), c2, c0, { c1 }, w0)
  sylibr(w0, (c0 â‹‚ { c1 })= âˆ…, Â¬ c1 âˆˆ c0)
  disjsn(c0, c1)
  eqidd((c0 â‹ƒ { c1 }), w0)
  sylancl(w0, (c0 â‹ƒ { c1 })âˆˆ Fin, c0 âˆˆ Fin, { c1 } âˆˆ Fin)
  snfi(c1)
  unfi(c0, { c1 })
  pm2.61dan((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ(c0 â‹ƒ { c1 })), c2 âˆˆ â„‚, s0 âˆˆ c0)
  adantlr(w0, s0 âˆˆ(c0 â‹ƒ { c1 }), s0 âˆˆ c0, c2 âˆˆ â„‚)
  eqeltrd(c2, cc, c3, ((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ(c0 â‹ƒ { c1 }))âˆ§ Â¬ s0 âˆˆ c0))
  syl(((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ(c0 â‹ƒ { c1 }))âˆ§ Â¬ s0 âˆˆ c0), c2 = c3, s0 = c1)
  adantll(w0, s0 âˆˆ(c0 â‹ƒ { c1 }), Â¬ s0 âˆˆ c0, s0 = c1)
  syl((s0 âˆˆ(c0 â‹ƒ { c1 })âˆ§ Â¬ s0 âˆˆ c0), s0 = c1, s0 âˆˆ { c1 })
  elunnel1(s0, c0, { c1 })
  elsni(s0, c1)
  ad2antrr(w0, s0 âˆˆ(c0 â‹ƒ { c1 }), Â¬ s0 âˆˆ c0, c3 âˆˆ â„‚)
  oveq2d(prod(s0 âˆˆ c0, c2), cmul, prod(s0 âˆˆ { c1 }, c2), c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, prod(s0 âˆˆ { c1 }, c2)= c3, c1 âˆˆ c4, c3 âˆˆ â„‚)
  prodsnf(s0, c1, c4, c3, c2)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, { c1 })

}

blocks.name: fprodsplit1f
blocks.content: Separate out a term in a finite product. A version of ~ fprodsplit1 using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fprodsplit1f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, cmul, cprod(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c3)), c1))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  eqtrd(cprod(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, cmul, cprod(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c3)), c1)), co(cprod(s0, csn(c3), c1), cmul, cprod(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c3)), c1)), w0)
  fprodsplitf(s0, c0, c1, csn(c3), cdif(c0, csn(c3)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cin(csn(c3), cdif(c0, csn(c3))), emptycls))
  disjdif(csn(c3), c0)
  eqcomd(c0, cun(csn(c3), cdif(c0, csn(c3))), w0)
  sylib(w0, wceq(cun(csn(c3), cdif(c0, csn(c3))), c0), wss(csn(c3), c0))
  snssd(c3, c0, w0)
  undif(csn(c3), c0)
  oveq1d(cprod(s0, csn(c3), c1), cmul, cprod(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c3)), c1), c2, w0)
  eqtrd(cprod(s0, csn(c3), c1), c2, csb(s0, c3, c1), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, csn(c3), c1), csb(s0, c3, c1)), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(csb(s0, c3, c1), cc))
  sylc(w0, wcel(csb(s0, c3, c1), cc), wcel(c3, c0), wa(w0, wcel(c3, c0)))
  ancli(w0, wcel(c3, c0))
  vtoclg1f(s0, c3, c0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(c3, c0)), wcel(csb(s0, c3, c1), cc)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(c3, c0)), wcel(csb(s0, c3, c1), cc))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(c3, c0))
  nfv(s0, wcel(c3, c0))
  nfel1(s0, csb(s0, c3, c1), cc)
  nfcsb1v(s0, c3, c1)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c3), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc), wa(w0, wcel(c3, c0)), wcel(csb(s0, c3, c1), cc))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), c3), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c3, c0))
  eleq1(cv(s0), c3, c0)
  eleq1d(c1, cc, csb(s0, c3, c1), wceq(cv(s0), c3))
  csbeq1a(s0, c3, c1)
  prodsns(s0, c3, c0, c1)
  csbiedf(s0, c3, c1, c2, c0, w0)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c0, csn(c3))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, c0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)

blocks.content: Any finite product containing a zero term is itself zero. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)

thm fprodeq0g(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), nat0))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c0))

blocks.name: fprodmodd
blocks.content: If all factors of two finite products are equal modulo ` M ` , the products are equal modulo ` M ` . (Contributed by AV, 7-Jul-2021.)
